summary: This mod gives each playable race its own directory in the textures folder. So you can make each race have unique textures. This is not a race mod. It does not add new races.
descriptionHtml:
This mod gives each playable race its own directory in the textures folder. So you can make each race have unique textures. This is not a race mod. It does not add new races.

This mod allows you to edit textures for any race without affecting the other races in any way.

This mod does not allow custom meshes despite how much I wish it could.
As far as I can tell, that requires custom races.

This mod is for those that just want unique textures for each race, and nothing more.

I understand that you may want more, but I will not be providing it so don\'t ask. This mod is just textures, unless I find an easy way to do meshes.

Please report any missing paths or bugs. Do NOT report missing textures unless you are 100% sure that it is my fault. This mod effectively multiplies the textures for playable races by 8. So you may miss a texture here or there.
author: ShadowGamer19
